metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5607 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site request forgery in the REST API in IPython 2 and 3.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5607` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ipython - 2.4.1-1
ipython-notebook - 2.4.1-1
ipython-notebook-common - 2.4.1-1
ipython-qtconsole - 2.4.1-1
ipython3 - 2.4.1-1
ipython3-notebook - 2.4.1-1
ipython3-qtconsole - 2.4.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ipython package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.1-1').
